name: Federal Express European Services Inc
bossPosition: SVP Legal & General Counsel International Affairs
goal: The FedEx group provides customers and businesses worldwide with a broad portfolio of transportation, e-commerce and business services. FedEx Express offers a wide range of domestic and international shipping services for delivery of packages and freight including priority services, which provide time-definite delivery within one, two or three business days worldwide, and deferred or economy services, which provide time-definite delivery within five business days worldwide. On May 25, 2016, FedEx announced the acquisition of TNT Express, one of the worldâ€™s largest express delivery companies.
